subtitleNullable: Analysis of various manga styles collected in a dataset with 1000 images.
descriptionNullable:
Manga Styles

This dataset, named "Manga Styles", is a collection of pictures showcasing various artistic styles often seen in anime and manga. It's divided into different categories, like Chibi, Shoujo, Shounen, Seinen, and Mecha, each representing a specific artistic approach commonly found in anime and manga.

File Format

The images in this dataset are in JPG format.

In each category, you'll find folders containing images from different manga series that embody the style.

Chibi

This style is characterized by reduced character proportions, large eyes, and simplified facial features. It gives the characters the impression of being tiny and cute, and is also used to highlight their comical or playful aspects.

  • Chi's Sweet Home

    This manga style is known for its shrunken characters, large eyes, and tiny forms. "Chi's Sweet Home" is the story of a little kitten named Chi who gets lost and finds a home with kind owners. This style fits the Chibi genre with its cute and simplistic characters and comical storytelling.

Guro

This style of manga depicts violent and violent scenes, often with extreme levels of violence and gore. This style may include horrifying and repulsive images intended to evoke shock or disgust in the viewer.

  • Hellsing

    Manga belongs to the Guro style and is known for its brutal scenes, violence and gruesome images. This is the story of the Helsing organization, which fights vampires and other supernatural threats. The Guro style is reflected in the manga's dark and violent tone and depictions of bloody battles.

Mecha

This style of manga and anime focuses on mechanical designs such as robots, mecha, and other technical devices. It is usually associated with science fiction and contains high-tech elements such as battle armor, cyborgs and spaceships.

  • Evangelion

    Is a manga that focuses on mechanical designs such as robots and mecha. It describes fights between giant robots and alien creatures. This style refers to Mecha due to the presence of giant robots and futuristic technology.

Sentai

This style of manga follows a team of heroes united to work together to resist villains or protect the world. It is often associated with the superhero genre and contains elements of action and adventure scenes, and often uses the theme of friendship and unity in a team of heroes.

  • Sailor Moon

    Is the story of a group of girl warriors known as the Sailor Soldiers who fight to protect the world from evildoers. They wear superhero costumes and use their powers to defeat villains. This style is consistent with Sentai due to the team of heroes and their battle suits.

Shonen

This genre of manga is aimed at a young male audience and often contains fast-paced plots that feature action scenes, adventure and often humor. It can include various topics such as friendship, competition, self-improvement and achieving goals.

  • Onepunchman

    Is a manga about Saitama, a hero who can defeat any opponent with one punch. This style refers to Shonen due to its fast-paced plots, fast-paced action scenes, and the humor that is present in the narrative.

Data source:

The data in the dataset is collected from various sources, including databases, websites, and public APIs. Below are detailed descriptions of the main sources:

  • Mangalib: Data collection was carried out using the Mangalib API, which provides access to a wide range of manga. I have collected information and photos of manga.
    Mangalib Website
  • Read Manga: Pages of manga and their illustrations was collected by scanning and analyzing samples provided on the Read Manga website.
    Read Manga Website
  • Personal Collection: This source includes my own manga and illustrations taken by me and represents unique data not available in other sources.

The goal of this dataset is to provide a resource for researchers, artists, and fans to explore and understand the various artistic styles in anime and manga. By studying the visual elements in each style, researchers can learn more about the cultural impact and artistic trends in anime and manga.

Acknowledge

I thank my university, Ala-Too International University, for a valuable course on artificial intelligence. Special thanks to the teachers, Mr Dim and Ruslan Agai, for their dedicated guidance and professionalism. This course allowed me to expand my knowledge and skills in the field of artificial intelligence, which will have long-term implications for my professional growth. Thank you for the opportunity to dive into this exciting area of ​​knowledge.

Ala-Too University Website Course Link
